bibl.title: Two penthemeros certificates from the papers of a weaving family
bibl.note: Belong to the family of Pausiris, son of Panephremmis, who lived in Soknopaiou Nesos. - 1. P. Mich. Inv. 1602e. 16 May, ca. 148 CE. - 2. Inv. 3860b. 18 Aug., 150 CE.
bibl.seg: W. Graham Claytor, Two Penthemeros Certificates from the Papers of a Weaving Family.
Belong to the family of Pausiris, son of Panephremmis, who lived in Soknopaiou Nesos. - 1. P. Mich. Inv. 1602e. 16 May, ca. 148 CE. - 2. Inv. 3860b. 18 Aug., 150 CE.
